title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately applies changes
OB:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. The package view is filtered.
EB: When deleting a working set, the package view in the background should not immediately refilter. The refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
SR:
- Create a working set with one project and select it.
- Attempt to delete the working set.
- Verify that the package view is not immediately refiltered.
- Verify that the package view only refilters when closing the working set selection dialog.
- Press cancel and verify that all changes made to the working sets are canceled, including the remove operation.
